entries.essay_en: CareerSpark File I spotlights five high-growth, accessible careers for youth aged 14–24. A UX researcher in SF earns $95K decoding user behavior—no psych degree needed. Wind turbine techs climb 300-ft towers for $62K in clean energy, 61% growth. Community health workers bridge care gaps at $48K with a 3-month cert. No-code developers ship MVPs in days for $75K using Bubble, demand up 500%. Sustainability coordinators turn green strategy into $80K corporate roles. All paths require no traditional degree—just skills, hustle, and CareerSpark tools: prototypes, safety labs, CDC scripts, templates, and ESG calculators. From empathy to algorithms, one insight, one climb, or one dashboard launches a future. 170 million new jobs emerge by 2030—CareerSpark ensures youth claim them first.
